meaningMnemonic: All you can do is <kanji>consider</kanji> your <kanji>grief</kanji> and how it's ruining your life. That's called <vocabulary>anxiety</vocabulary>, and it can be a real problem. You end up being <vocabulary>concern</vocabulary>ed about everything, but don't worry. There are ways to combat it. You'll be okay!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
